page.title: 11ROADSIDE SALES, ALLET,TRURO.
page.content: In addition to Allet garden shop, several farms including Hillview Farm sell produce from the gate & a green- grocer's van calls regularly. Many farmers grow vegetables for themselves & as animal food,& to sell direct from the farm.Swedes,locally called turnips are 15p.each;broccoli or cauliflowers, 25p.each: these are normally left by the gate with a container for money; there seems to be no problem with "shoplifting". One acre can grow about 15 tons of potatoes & no quota is needed for this small amount but they cannot be sold to the Potato Marketing Board. Typical prices at the moment for 25kg.bags are _second early, eg. Maris Peer,Â£1.60; _maincrop, eg.Desiree,Pentland Dell, Â£1.90. (October, 1985). Sales are steady,to regular customers &passing trade.Quality is mostly good.
